hero.description: Invest in real farms through our gamified platform. Watch your investments grow alongside actual crops, and earn yields backed by verified harvests.

about.title: About OwnaFarm
about.subtitle: Bridging Investors and Farmers Through Technology
about.description: OwnaFarm is an innovative agricultural investment platform that connects global investors with Indonesian farmers. Our platform uses blockchain technology for transparency and gamification mechanics for engagement.
about.forInvestorsDesc: Invest in real farms, monitor growth, and earn yields from verified harvests.
about.forFarmersDesc: Access funding, offtaker contracts, and real-time monitoring tools for your farm.

howItWorks.title: Process
howItWorks.subtitle: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up seamlessly with Privy - no complex wallet setup required.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Explore verified farms and choose crops that match your investment goals.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Fund your chosen farm and watch it grow through our gamified interface.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Receive your returns when crops are harvested and delivered to offtakers.
howItWorks.farmerStep1Desc: Complete KYC verification and submit your farm documentation.
howItWorks.farmerStep2Desc: Add your farm details, photos, and available crop opportunities.
howItWorks.farmerStep3Desc: Receive funding from investors to support your agricultural operations.
howItWorks.farmerStep4Desc: Cultivate crops and deliver to verified offtakers for settlement.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Why Choose OwnaFarm
features.feature1Desc: All transactions are recorded on blockchain for full transparency and security.
features.feature2Desc: Access live CCTV feeds and IoT sensor data to monitor your investment 24/7.
features.feature3Desc: Turn agricultural investment into an engaging game. Watch your virtual farm grow alongside real crops.
features.feature4Desc: Partner with major Indonesian food companies like Indofood and Mayora for guaranteed purchases.
features.feature5Desc: Automated fund distribution and yield payments through audited smart contracts.
features.feature6Desc: Track your investment performance with detailed analytics and reports.

cta.title: Ready to Start Growing?
cta.description: Join thousands of investors and farmers building the future of sustainable agriculture together.

footer.description: Gamified agricultural investment platform connecting investors with verified Indonesian farmers.

registerFarm.pageDescription: Join OwnaFarm and access funding from investors worldwide. Complete the registration process to get started.

success.title: Registration Submitted!
success.description: Thank you for registering with OwnaFarm. Our team will review your application and contact you within 2-3 business days.

personalInfo.description: Please provide your basic personal details

businessInfo.title: Business Information
businessInfo.description: Tell us about your farming business
businessInfo.cropsDescription: Select the crops you have experience growing

errors.bankAccountNumber: Account number must be at least 10 digits
errors.bankAccountName: Please enter the account holder name
errors.yearsOfExperience: Please enter your years of experience
errors.cropsExpertise: Please select at least one crop

documents.title: Document Upload
documents.ktpPhotoDesc: Clear photo of your ID card (max 5MB)
documents.selfieWithKtpDesc: Photo of yourself holding your KTP (max 5MB)
documents.npwpPhotoDesc: Photo or scan of your NPWP (max 5MB)

review.description: Please verify all information before submitting
review.termsAgreement: I agree to the OwnaFarm Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. I confirm that all information provided is accurate and I authorize OwnaFarm to verify my documents.

errors.terms: Please agree to the terms and conditions
